name: Bizzo's Bad Day
description:
Very Scary Game. Prepare to be frightened. 

Plot -

Bizzo has had a pretty good day so far. He got his two boys ice-cream and has forgiven his brother Keith, but when he takes his iconic 9:00 walk in the dark and evil forest, some scary things happen! 

Controls - 

wasd to move. w to go forward. a to go left, d to go right. No arrow keys!

Hold down on right mouse button to move mouse without moving your character.

Escape to pause.
